headline: Salesforce Appoints New CTO, Shakes Up Other Executive Roles
summary: As Salesforce heads into its new fiscal year and focuses on building and selling AI agents, CEO Marc Benioff is shuffling his executive ranks.

raw.headline: Salesforce Appoints New CTO, Shakes Up Other Executive Roles
raw.summary: As Salesforce heads into its new fiscal year and focuses on building and selling AI agents, CEO Marc Benioff is shuffling his executive ranks.

headline: Why Salesforce Stock Is Sinking Today
summary: Shares of Salesforce (NYSE: CRM) were trading lower on Thursday.  Salesforce stock took a hit after the sales software giant announced on Wednesday evening that longtime President and COO, Brian Millham, would be retiring.  Brian Millham was with Salesforce for 25 years.

raw.headline: Why Salesforce Stock Is Sinking Today
raw.summary: Shares of Salesforce (NYSE: CRM) were trading lower on Thursday.  Salesforce stock took a hit after the sales software giant announced on Wednesday evening that longtime President and COO, Brian Millham, would be retiring.  Brian Millham was with Salesforce for 25 years.

headline: Salesforce, Workday Are Hiring More Overseas to Save Cash
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Software companies are under pressure to invest in new artificial intelligence capabilities without denting profits. One increasingly popular strategy to keep costs low is to shift hiring outside the US. headline: Salesforce Names Board Member As Software Maker's New CFO And COO
summary: Software maker Salesforce named named a board of directors member, Robin Washington, as its new CFO and COO. Current COO Brian Millham will retire.

headline: Salesforce just hard-launched a new COFO — battle-tested finance and operations leader Robin Washington
summary: A veteran operator and finance chief, Washington will continue serving on the tech giant’s board in her new executive role, the company announced.

headline: Robin Washington Named Salesforce’s New COFO Amid Company’s Transformation Into Agentic Era
summary: Washington brings decades of experience, having held leadership positions at some of the world’s most respected companies.
